name: Little Timmy
description:
You are this Little knight named Timmy. Timmy lost his magical sword somewhere in the dungeon. Help Little Timmy go through the dungeon safely and retrieve his sword. But beware, there is a monster lurking at the end of the dungeon. Use the magic sword to defeat this beast and be free!

How To Play 

Avoid the lava and the spikes. Use the white keys to open doors. Reach the green square to make a checkpoint.

Controls 

|| A-D or Left-Right Arrow  keys to move || 

|| W to Jump ||

|| Left Mouse to attack ||

Tools used

  • Unity 2019.3
  • FL Studio
